thread.title: Long Weekend in NYC for the ACC tournament
thread.title_full: Long Weekend in NYC for the ACC tournament - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer L
title: Long Weekend in NYC for the ACC tournament
text:
The room was clean, beds were comfortable, staff was extremely helpful! We stayed here for three nights, four days. The staff was very welcoming and inviting, helped us with advice on some sight seeing as well as navigating the trains. The accommodations were spacious enough for four of us (two adults and two kids, teens) especially for a NYC room. It was a quieter location with a great little outdoor area and roof top bar. Would certainly stay here again! Location was great, within walking distance to Herald Square, Times Square, Empire State Building, parks, etc. Really a little gem!
